title: HOW TO FIX CORRUPTED FILES?
body: When I turned on LoL it said "Your LoL files are corrupted." HOW DO YOU FIX THIS PROBLEM?

replies.body: I have the same issue with LOL . Have you found a solution ?
Check the time i got thos problem and my date was 2011 xD
I cant open league of legends.Always saids that my files are corrupted and i dont know how to fix.Please help
I just got this issue, help needed and very much appreciated

The quickest and easiest method is to run a repair through the client options. If you can't get to that point before the client crashes, you could also run this [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with a **force repatch** to fix up those game files as well.
I kinda have the same problem and your solution doesn't work so I don't know what to do

Hmmmm a full reinstall might be best option at this point. Grab that [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) again and run it with the options **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on.
